description:
Shino, Kotarou`s troublesome cousin, visits while her father is on a business trip. Shino goes to the amusement park with Kotarou and his friends, but learns the truth about her father.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cómo jugar en un parque de diversiones
Façon de s`amuser au parc d`attractions
How to Play at an Amusement Park
